name: EStAff Ebook Store Affiliate – get affiliate commissions and deep backlinks for SEO from 4+ mio ebooks
author: Campation LLC

sections.description:
Ebook Store Affiliate connects your website with World of Digitals‘ giant digital product database and gives you access to currently over 4.4 million commercial ebooks in 30 languages from 1.2 million authors and 30,000 publishers, 22 currencies are supported.

With this internationally leading product range, you can not only supplement and enhance any content (“further reading”) as a service for your readers, but also earn money with ebooks in the right context!

Select up to 1,000 ebooks by keywords, language and price and import them into your website in seconds. And define one of 20 languages of the shop interface your visitors are sent to (arabic, german, english, spanish, french, hindi, indonesian, italian, dutch, portuguese, swedish, polish, russian, chinese, turkish, romanian, malay, thai, ukrainian, vietnamese). Thus you can adopt the shop language to the language of your website!

Ebook Store Affiliate then provides a responsive widget and shortcode with which you can integrate all ebooks into your website in an attractive way, contextually and page-related. It also allows you to group ebooks on specific topics into collections and to import ebooks into your WooCommerce shop in any category! Of course, you can view various statistics and charts about the success of your offer.

Advantage 1: Affiliate Commission

When a visitor clicks on one of the presented ebooks, he lands on the corresponding product page of World of Digitals. If he buys the ebook, you will receive a commission of 9% of the purchase price as soon as you have registered as an affiliate. Your commission is paid weekly via PayPal.

Advantage 2: Content-relevant outgoing links (SEO)

Search engines reward you when you add content-relevant outgoing links to your pages. This happens automatically by integrating ebooks into your content. Every displayed ebook is linked to its sales page at World of Digitals and adds a content related outgoing link to your pages. Search enginges will value this as most relevant content helping your visitors to find more related information.

Advantage 3: Deep cross backlinks (SEO)

You also receive strong SEO backlinks advantages, because when one of your visitors clicks on an ebook, they land on the corresponding product page at World of Digitals – and on this product page your website will be mentioned in the “Recommended by” section, with a deep backlink to your page on which your visitor clicked on the ebook! Assuming there is a lot of interest in the ebooks you present on your website, you will receive tons of deep content cross backlinks. Search engines will rate each page of your website as highly relevant because it is cross-linked to comparable external content. This can have a huge impact on your SE ranking.

Advantage 4: Automatic a/b split testing and optimization

  • Ebook Store Affiliate automatically optimizes the display of the best selling ebooks over time. The sorting of the ebooks is changed in several steps:
  • First, all ebooks are shown alternately – Ebook Store Affiliate ensures that all ebooks are presented equally often.
  • As soon as 20 ebooks have been clicked on at least 3 times, all clicked ebooks are presented first (regardless of the number of individual clicks) – if more ebooks are needed for a page, they are filled up with ebooks that have not yet been clicked.
  • As soon as 5 ebooks have been sold at least 3 times, all ebooks that have already been sold are presented first, filled up with ebooks that have already been clicked. Ebooks that have not yet been clicked are only selected if the number of ebooks that have already been purchased and clicked on a page is not sufficient.

So you can be sure that over time – depending on the number of visitors to your website – more and more the most interesting and best-selling ebooks will be presented!

Third party / external services

Ebook Store Affiliate needs data from the product database of World of Digitals and a connection to the API services of World of Digitals (https://worldofdigitals.com). Every time you select ebooks to display on your website this connection is established, as well as every 24 hours to update the products data on your website. To update the statistics shown by Ebook Store Affiliate every time a sale has taken place the API calls a webhook of Ebook Store Affiliate. There is no data exchange with the API that is related to visitors and / or personal data. Ebook Store Affiliate and API comply with all rules of GDPR. Please check World of Digitals’ terms (https://worldofdigitals.com/terms) and privacy policy (https://worldofdigitals.com/privacy/).

Reasons to use Ebook Store Affiliate

Ebook Store Affiliate helps you to create backlinks, get deep backlinks, create cross backlinks, generate affiliate commissions, receive affiliate commissions, sell ebooks, automatic backlinks, generate outgoing links, automatic outgoing links

Compatibility

  • compatible with all themes and plugins
  • PHP 8.0 – 8.3
  • WordPress 6.0 – 6.6
  • WooCommerce 8+

Requirements

  • free registration as an affiliate @ World of Digitals to receive weekly affiliate commissions
sections.installation:
1. Check the impressing product catalog of World of Digitals
  2. Download and install Ebook Store Affiliate through the WordPress plugins screen
  3. Activate Ebook Store Affiliate through the plugins screen in WordPress
  4. Select and import the products you like to promote (menu “Products”)
  5. Add widgets and shortcodes to your frontend
  6. Finally register as an affiliate of World of Digitals (menu “Affiliate account”) to receive commissions
sections.faq:
What do the affiliate links look like?

The World of Digitals Affiliate Network does not use link parameter as “?aid=1234” which easily can be recognized as affiliate link. Instead it recognizes your visitors coming from your site with other technologies. Your visitors will not see you affiliation.

How much commission do I earn?

World of Digitals pays a 9% commission on all sales to its affiliates.

When and how commissions are paid?

Commissions are paid once a week by Paypal in USD.

Will Ebook Store Affiliate slow down my public website?

no way! Widgets and shortcods have been coded professionally and only will add 1-2ms to the page load time of your website. All cover images are loaded “lazy” / asynchronously.

Are Ebook Store Affiliate’s advertising materials responsive and “mobile ready”?

Of course they are – and tested on different mobile devices.

How difficult is the configuration?

The admin interface is very intuitive and easy to use. Just enter the keywords you are ebooks searching for – select the best ones, click “import” and you’re done to configure the frontend widget

Where do I find detailed instructions?

The plugin menu “Instructions” contains a complete manual for your interest.

How can I get support?

Simply contact support@worldofdigitals.com by email!
